venue.name: The Pickled Onion Bar and Grill

item.description:
We'll meet around 6:30 p.m. and order up some food. (You pay for what you eat/drink). Seating fills up QUICKLY! Stump Trivia starts around 7:30 p.m. For those not familiar, Stump Trivia is a fun, FREE competitive team trivia game played in the bar. For information about The Pickled Onion, including directions and menu, click http://pickledonionbeverly.com/. Can't beat their $2 special for burgers.

 

We can have up to 6 people on a team so if more than 6 attending we will have at least 2 teams.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll try to grab tables along wall near Trivia DJ area
item.name: Stump Trivia at The Onion
